en.uptime: Friendly uptime of the current Trovo live session.
en.live: Whether Trovo stream is currently live.
en.session_chat_count: Number of chat messages seen in current session.
en.last_follower: Username of the latest follower event.
en.current_first_chatter: First chatter username for the current stream session.
en.previous_first_chatter: First chatter username from previous stream session.
en.last_chatter: Username of the latest chat message author.
en.last_raid_amount: Viewer count from the latest raid.
en.session_follower_count: Follower events counted for current session.
en.session_subscribers_count: Subscriber events counted for current session.
en.session_raiders: Comma-separated list of raiders for current session.
en.last_subscriber: Username of the latest subscriber or gift recipient.
en.session_subscribers: Comma-separated list of subscribers for current session.
en.last_spell: Name of the latest Trovo spell.
en.last_spell_amount: Quantity of the latest Trovo spell.
en.last_spell_value: Value per unit of the latest Trovo spell.
en.last_message: Text of the latest relayed Trovo chat message.
en.last_message_id: Message id of the latest relayed Trovo chat message.
en.last_event_at: ISO timestamp of the latest Trovo event processed.
